summary.span: 包含不可变集合的联锁交换机制。

This type is thread safe.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Update<T> (ref T location, Func<T,T> transformer) where T : class;
.method public static hidebysig bool Update<class T>(!!T& location, class System.Func`2<!!T, !!T> transformer) cil managed
Public Shared Function Update(Of T As Class) (ByRef location As T, transformer As Func(Of T, T)) As Boolean
static member Update : * Func<'T, 'T (requires 'T : null and 'T : null)> -> bool (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 数据类型。

span.span: The type of data.

param.name: location
param.span: 要更改的变量或字段，可通过多个线程进行访问。

span.span: The variable or field to be changed, which may be accessed by multiple threads.

param.name: transformer
param.span: 可改变值的函数。

span.span: A function that mutates the value.

param.span: 此函数应无任何副作用，因为在与其他线程发生争用时，该函数可能运行多次。

span.span: This function should be side-effect free, as it may run multiple times when races occur with other threads.

summary.span: 通过指定转换函数使用乐观锁定事务语义就地改变值。

span.span: Mutates a value in-place with optimistic locking transaction semantics via a specified transformation function.

summary.span: 可根据需要多次重试转换，以赢取乐观锁定争用。

span.span: The transformation is retried as many times as necessary to win the optimistic locking race.

returns.span: 如果位置的值通过应用 函数的结果发生更改，则为 true，如果因上一次调用 返回现有值导致位置的值保持不变，则为 false。

span.span: true if the location's value is changed by applying the result of the function; false if the location's value remained the same because the last invocation of returned the existing value.

Public Shared Function Update(Of T As Class, TArg As Class) (ByRef location As T, transformer As Func(Of T, TArg, T), transformerArgument As TArg) As Boolean
static member Update : * Func<'T, 'Arg, 'T (requires 'T : null and 'T : null)> * 'Arg -> bool (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 数据类型。

span.span: The type of data.

typeparam.name: TArg
typeparam.span: 自变量的类型传递给转换器。

span.span: The type of argument passed to the transformer.

param.name: location
param.span: 要更改的变量或字段，可通过多个线程进行访问。

span.span: The variable or field to be changed, which may be accessed by multiple threads.

param.name: transformer
param.span: 可改变值的函数。

span.span: A function that mutates the value.

param.span: 此函数应无任何副作用，因为在与其他线程发生争用时，该函数可能运行多次。

span.span: This function should be side-effect free, as it may run multiple times when races occur with other threads.

param.name: transformerArgument
param.span: 要传递给 transformer 的参数。

span.span: The argument to pass to transformer.

summary.span: 通过指定转换函数使用乐观锁定事务语义就地改变值。

span.span: Mutates a value in-place with optimistic locking transaction semantics via a specified transformation function.

summary.span: 可根据需要多次重试转换，以赢取乐观锁定争用。

span.span: The transformation is retried as many times as necessary to win the optimistic locking race.

returns.span: 如果位置的值通过应用 函数的结果发生更改，则为 true，如果因上一次调用 返回现有值导致位置的值保持不变，则为 false。

span.span: true if the location's value is changed by applying the result of the function; false if the location's value remained the same because the last invocation of returned the existing value.
